```{r,echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
trash_df = 
  read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",range = "A2:N408") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  na.omit(trash_df$Dumpster)
trash_df$sports_balls = round(trash_df$sports_balls, digits = 0)
view(trash_df)
```

```{r}
trash_df = drop_na(trash_df, dumpster)
round(trash_df$sports_balls, digits = 0)
```
